articles.title: Blood Immunity Altered in Alzheimer’s - Neuroscience News
articles.description: A new study reveals epigenetic alterations in the immune system of Alzheimer's patients' blood, suggesting environmental or behavioral factors could influence Alzheimer's risk.

articles.title: Study suggests picking your nose could increase risk of Alzheimer's disease - indy100
articles.description:
A new study has suggested that picking your nose may increase the risk of developing Alzheimer’s disease.
For years, scientists have been trying to learn more about the causes and treatment of Alzheimer’s disease, which robs people of their memories and affec…
